_comments: MS 365 Entra ID MFA Compliance Configuration File
Copy this file to config.json and update with your tenant details
IMPORTANT: Never commit config.json with real secrets to version control
_TenantId_Help: Your Azure AD Tenant ID (found in Azure Portal > Azure Active Directory > Properties)
_ClientId_Help: App Registration Client ID (Application ID from Azure Portal > App Registrations)

ComplianceThresholds._ActiveUserDays_Help: Users with successful sign-in within this many days are considered Active
ComplianceThresholds._InactiveDays_Help: Users without sign-in for this many days are flagged as Inactive/Stale
ComplianceThresholds._MinimumMFAMethods_Help: Expected minimum number of MFA methods per user for compliance
ComplianceThresholds._PreferredDefaultMethod_Help: Preferred default MFA method (MicrosoftAuthenticator, Phone, Email, etc.)

Retention._BaselineRetentionDays_Help: How many days to retain old baseline, report, and log files before auto-cleanup

FolderPaths._FolderPaths_Help: Optional: Override default folder paths (relative to script location)

Features._EnableAutoCleanup_Help: Automatically delete files older than BaselineRetentionDays
Features._VerboseLogging_Help: Enable detailed debug logging (useful for troubleshooting)
